Posts.Title: Breast scar pain

Posts.Content:
Thank you so much for the reply..
All I know is that it wasnt cancer Praise GOD.
The pulling can catch me off guard and I have to all most hold my breast until the pain and pulling goes away. it doesnt last long..
I pray that everthing goes well for you.I really do and when did you go thru all this?
ty Trish
Posts.Title: Breast scar pain

Posts.Content:
Hi all this is new to me so forgive me if you dont understand.
But I had a lump removed from my left breast around 7 years ago.
I have had this pain before but went away, but recently I have been having pain like something strecthing from my breast to my arm..
I was wondering if anyone else felt this type of pain. It dosent last long 
It comes and goes fast.
Thank you all
Trish
